item.title: 中央银行放宽资本市场贷款后印度银行股大涨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 新加坡政府投资公司（GIC）认为人工智能风险投资存在 "炒作 "泡沫，债券存在抛售风险
item.description: 新加坡政府投资私人有限公司（GIC Pte）的首席投资官警告说，早期人工智能风险投资正在形成 "炒作泡沫"，他也加入了投资者的行列，对该行业的繁荣敲响了警钟。【原文：GIC Pte’s chief investment officer warned of a “hype bubble” building in early-stage AI venture investing, joining a chorus of investors sounding alarms over the sector’s boom.】

item.title: GIP 接近达成以约 400 亿美元收购 Aligned 数据中心的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Global Infrastructure Partners 正在就收购麦格理支持的 Aligned Data Centers 进行深入谈判，这是今年最大的交易之一。【原文：Global Infrastructure Partners is in advanced talks to acquire Macquarie-backed Aligned Data Centers in one of the biggest deals of the year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行上田保持开放态度，避免明确暗示利率走势
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）重申了该行在利率问题上的长期立场，避免在本月晚些时候召开的董事会上就加息前景发出任何明确的信号，从而保持了政策选择的开放性。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda kept his policy options open by reiterating the bank’s long-held stance on interest rates, avoiding sending any clear signals about the prospects for a rate hike when the board meets later this month.】

item.title: 司法部投诉后，苹果撤下 ICE 跟踪应用程序
item.description: 苹果公司的应用程序商店下架了 ICEBlock 和其他用于报告和跟踪美国移民与海关执法局特工行踪的应用程序，因为政府对此表示担忧。【原文：Apple Inc.’s App Store removed ICEBlock and other applications used to report and track sightings of US Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents after the government raised concerns.】

item.title: 印度 TCS 和科技公司将因特朗普的 H-1B 签证冲击而面临质疑
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务有限公司（Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.）将成为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）采取行动限制一项重要工作签证后第一家面对投资者的印度 IT 企业，这使得该公司股价暴跌，盈利前景黯淡。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. will be the first Indian IT firm to face investors after Donald Trump moved to curb a key work visa, sending the company’s shares tumbling and dimming its earnings outlook.】

item.title: 星展银行扩大市值领先华侨银行的优势，股息创历史新高
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）今年股价大涨，市值领先同业华侨银行（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd.’s blistering share rally this year has widened its market value lead over its peer Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp. to a level never seen before.】

item.title: 朝日网络攻击后，7-Eleven 超干啤酒供应告罄
item.description: 日本朝日集团控股有限公司（Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.，以下简称 "朝日控股"）的生产和销售因网络攻击陷入瘫痪，Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. and other retailers in Japan are warning customers of possible Asahi Super Dry beer shortages after a cyberattack paralyzed production and distribution at at Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 全球投资公司 Arena Investors 关闭新加坡办事处
item.description: 据知情人士透露，全球多策略投资公司 Arena Investors LP 正在关闭其新加坡办事处，并寻求将资源重新分配到其他地方。【原文：Global multi-strategy investment firm Arena Investors LP is shutting its Singapore office and seeking to reallocate resources elsewhere, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI 称马斯克的 xAI 提起保密诉讼是为了 "欺负 "前员工
item.description: OpenAI 公司称，指控其窃取 xAI 技术的诉讼只是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）转移人们对其自己的生成式人工智能公司失败的注意力的最新尝试。【原文：OpenAI Inc. says a lawsuit accusing it of stealing technology from xAI is just Elon Musk’s latest attempt to distract attention from the failures of his own generative artificial intelligence company.】

item.title: 日本央行行长上田的讲话和新闻发布会以及金融市场的发展。
item.description: 2025年9月19日星期五，日本东京，日本央行行长上田一夫在央行总部举行的新闻发布会上。日本央行向政策正常化又迈出了一步，宣布将开始卸载其持有的大量交易所交易基金，同时在一次有争议的投票中保持利率稳定，因为两名反对者推动加息。【原文：Kazuo Ueda, governor of the Bank of Japan (BOJ), during a news conference at the central bank's headquarters in Tokyo, Japan, on Friday, Sept. 19, 2025. The BOJ took another step toward policy normalization, announcing it would start to offload its massive exchange-traded fund holdings even while keeping interest rates steady in a contested vote as two dissenters pushed for a hike.】

item.title: 与 OpenAI 合作后，日立股价创四月以来最大涨幅
item.description: 日本电子和工业公司日立制作所（Hitachi Ltd.）与 OpenAI 建立战略合作伙伴关系，在能源、人工智能和其他领域开展合作，之后该公司股价大涨 9.3%，创 4 月 10 日以来最大涨幅。【原文：Hitachi Ltd. shares jumped as much as 9.3%, the most since April 10, after the Japanese electronics and industrial firm entered into a strategic partnership with OpenAI to collaborate on energy, artificial intelligence and other areas.】

item.title: 黄金将迎来第七周上涨，美国停摆为加息之路蒙上阴影
item.description: 由于美国政府停摆为寻求美联储货币宽松政策信号的投资者增加了另一层不确定性，黄金连续第七周上涨。【原文：Gold headed for a seventh weekly advance, as the US government shutdown added another layer of uncertainty for investors seeking signals on the Federal Reserve’s monetary-easing path.】

item.title: Arata Corp.因发行人原因取消 50 亿日元债券销售
item.description: 据 SMBC 日兴证券公司的一封电子邮件称，日本批发贸易公司 Arata Corp. 以发行人相关原因为由，取消了出售五年期日元公司债券的计划。【原文：Japanese wholesale trading company Arata Corp. canceled its plan to sell five-year yen corporate bonds, according to an email from SMBC Nikko Securities, citing issuer-related reasons.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴以 2,500 亿美元人工智能卷土重来，引发热议
item.description: 基金经理们认为，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）有望延续今年 2,500 亿美元的股价涨势，成为中国最热门的人工智能交易平台。【原文：Fund managers see potential for Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. to extend the $250 billion stock rally this year that’s made it China’s hottest artificial intelligence trade.】

item.title: 日本失业率升至一年多以来最高点
item.description: 日本的失业率升至一年多以来的最高点，表明劳动力市场略有松动，人们纷纷猜测日本央行近期将加息。【原文：Japan’s jobless rate rose to its highest in over a year, signaling a slight loosening of the labor market as speculation swirls over a Bank of Japan rate hike in the near term.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"供应会议召开前，石油将出现大幅单周下跌
item.description: 在欧佩克+会议召开之前，石油有望创下6月下旬以来的最大单周跌幅，预计这次会议将导致更多闲置桶的回归，加剧供应过剩的担忧。【原文：Oil was on track for the biggest weekly decline since late June, ahead of an OPEC+ meeting that’s expected to result in the return of more idled barrels, exacerbating concerns around oversupply.】

item.title: 大和聘请人工智能初创公司 Sakana 为零售客户开发工具
item.description: 大和证券集团公司（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc. is hiring startup Sakana AI to develop an artificial intelligence tool that can analyze individual investor profiles, joining a growing number of financial institutions adopting the technology to boost efficiency.】

item.title: 对冲基金追逐日本大选刀锋般的利润
item.description: 对冲基金正在采用一系列策略，以从日本这场悬而未决的领导力竞争中获利，包括计划抛售股票、押注日元走强或削减风险资产。【原文：Hedge funds are employing a range of strategies to profit from Japan’s too-close-to-call leadership race, including plans to sell stocks, bet on a stronger yen, or trim risk assets.】

item.title: 香港融资成本因美联储减息和贷款放缓而下降
item.description: 据分析师称，受美联储降息预期和贷款需求疲软的影响，香港的隔夜拆借成本到年底可能会降至3%左右。【原文：The cost of overnight borrowing in Hong Kong could fall to about 3% by year-end, driven by expected interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve and weak loan demand, according to analysts.】

item.title: 住友生命保险据说将采取措施避免标记债券损失
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，住友生命保险株式会社正在采取一项不同寻常的措施，以避免减记其债务资产的损失，并承诺在这些资产处于亏损状态时绝不出售。【原文：Sumitomo Life Insurance Co. is taking an unusual step to avoid writing down losses on its debt assets, promising to never sell them while they are in the red, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本领导层希望之星为争夺权力讨好反对党
item.description: 领导日本执政党自民党的热门候选人需要与反对党合作，以帮助在政策上取得进展，并稳定自民党摇摇欲坠的政权。【原文：The top contenders to lead Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party will need to collaborate with opposition parties to help make progress on policy and stabilize the LDP’s shaky grip on power.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将与华尔街同步下跌：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周五开盘走软，这表明全球股市在华尔街创下新高后，创纪录的涨势可能会得到喘息。【原文：Asian stocks were primed for a softer open Friday, signaling the record rally in global equities may be due for a breather after fresh highs on Wall Street.】

item.title: 第一品牌贷款人向 "黑盒子 "伸出援手
item.description: First Brands 集团的贷款人因该汽车零部件供应商使用资产负债表外融资而焦头烂额，他们迅速筹集了 11 亿美元的紧急救命钱，以防止该公司彻底倒闭。但是，他们的律师说，为了完成这笔贷款，这些公司不得不放弃了通常情况下对此类巨额贷款所要求的尽职调查。【原文：First Brands Group lenders burned by the auto parts supplier’s use of off-balance-sheet financing quickly assembled a $1.1 billion emergency lifeline to prevent the business from completely unraveling. But to pull it off their lawyer said the firms had to forgo the amount of diligence they’d normally require for such a sizable loan.】

item.title: 巴西与中国联手创建新的投资基金
item.description: 巴西开发银行和中国进出口银行同意设立一个 10 亿美元的基金，投资于能源转型、基础设施、采矿、农业和人工智能等领域。【原文：Brazil’s Development Bank and the Export-Import Bank of China agreed to create a $1 billion fund that will invest in sectors such as energy transition, infrastructure, mining, agriculture and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: MUFG 在日本大力发展财富管理业务，招聘更多银行家
item.description: 日本最大的银行正在招聘更多的应届毕业生和经验丰富的专家，以求在日本不断增长的财富管理市场上分一杯羹。【原文：Japan’s largest bank is recruiting more new graduates and experienced specialists as it seeks a bigger piece of the country’s growing wealth management market.】

item.title: 应用材料公司警告中国最新限制措施将冲击其销售额
item.description: 美国最大的半导体生产设备制造商应用材料公司（Applied Materials Inc.【原文：Applied Materials Inc., the largest US maker of machinery used to manufacture semiconductors, said an expansion of rules that restrict the export of its products to China will take another chunk out of its revenue.】

item.title: 高管称 Alphabet 计划出售或分拆 Verily 部门
item.description: 一位高级管理人员周四作证说，Alphabet 公司过去两年来一直在努力使其生命科学部门 Verily 在技术上脱钩，以便出售或分拆。【原文：Alphabet Inc. has been working for the past two years to technologically decouple its life sciences unit Verily so that it can be sold or spun off, a senior executive testified Thursday.】

item.title: 美国银行储备进一步下降，跌破 3 万亿美元关键关口
item.description: 作为美联储决定继续缩减资产负债表的一个关键因素，美国银行系统的储备金连续第八周下滑，创下了低于 3 万亿美元的新纪录。【原文：The US banking system’s reserves, a key factor in the Federal Reserve’s decision to keep shrinking its balance sheet, tumbled for the eighth straight week to a new mark below $3 trillion.】

item.title: Golub 的私人信用 CLO 为保险公司提供了罕见的期限游戏
item.description: 私人信贷公司 Golub Capital 出售了一种抵押贷款义务，该义务将投资者锁定在证券上的时间比一般交易更长，因为保险公司为寻找持有时间更长的资产而将资金投入私人信贷。【原文：Private credit firm Golub Capital sold a collateralized loan obligation that locks investors into the securities for longer than typical deals, as insurers pour money into private credit in their search for longer-held assets.】
